name: elora-crafting-arts
description: Elora Crafting Arts - Full Stack Application

scripts.install-all: cd elora-api && npm install && cd ../elora-web && npm install && cd ../elora-mobile && npm install
scripts.build-api: cd elora-api && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-web: cd elora-web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-mobile: cd elora-mobile && npm install && npx expo build
scripts.build-all: npm run build-api && npm run build-web && npm run build-mobile
scripts.dev-all: concurrently "npm run api" "npm run web" "npm run mobile"
scripts.vercel-build: cd elora-web && npm install && npm run build
